pull.title: Make segwit failure due to CLEANSTACK violation return a SCRIPT_ERR_CLEANSTACK error code
pull.body: If a segwit script terminates with a stack size not equal to one, the current error code is EVAL_FALSE. This is semantically wrong, and prevents explicitly checking CLEANSTACK violations in the unit tests. This PR changes the error code (and affected unit tests) to use SCRIPT_ERROR_CLEANSTACK instead of SCRIPT_ERROR_EVAL_FALSE.

events.message: Make segwit failure due to CLEANSTACK violation return a SCRIPT_ERR_CLEANSTACK error code.

events.body:
utACK

sidenote: I do wonder what "implicit" here means in the commend above. Implicit since no flag is passed, I suppose?

utACK 1e747e3c1e04a38c5ed6e8f8cd14077b8b7377c9.

@instagibbs Yes, I read that as "if we're into witness validation, SCRIPT_VERIFY_CLEANSTACK is assumed"
it's more "if we're into witness validation, cleanstack is implied (regardless of SCRIPT_VERIFY_CLEANSTACK)"
5 utACKs. Is this ready for merge?

issue.title: Update transaction and script tests
issue.body:
This updates various test vectors to the latest with associated changes, and includes license updates for the vectors from https://github.com/bcoin-org/bcoin/pull/352.

Policy and behavior changes:
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11423 Disables `OP_CODESEPARATOR` in non-segwit scripts and makes a positive `findAndDelete` result invalid. 
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10699 Makes `SCRIPT_VERIFY_UPGRADABLE_NOPS` not apply to `OP_CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY` and `OP_CHECKSEQUENCEVERIFY`. 
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12167 `CLEANSTACK` error code change instead of `EVAL_FALSE` for segwit scripts that terminate with a stack size not equal to one. 

Additional test cases:
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12600 Add a test for large tx output scripts with segwit input that was failing in pycoin.
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12082 Adds a missing test vector for `SINGLE|ANYONECANPAY` hash type
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12425 Add script tests related to BOOL ops and odd values like negative 0
